app.title: Mako MIDI Editor
app.subtitle: Simple MIDI editor for Walrus Audio Mako series

menu.title: Menu
menu.tipMidi: This app needs Web MIDI access to communicate with your gear. Allow access when the browser asks.
menu.tipPwa: Installable (PWA) ‚Äî add it to your home screen to use it offline too.

controls.heading: Controls
controls.selectConfig: Select a configuration to display the controls.
controls.noOutput: No MIDI output available ‚Äî controls are disabled.
